name: Alone
description: Alone is a Pixelated Survival Game set in the extremely cold Siberian Wilderness in 1983, Soviet Union.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, or 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz or faster processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 130 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8, or 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 130 MB available space
